name: Calcite UI Prototype Kit for ArcGIS Web Apps
description:
A started kit that includes all the fundamental components needed for building interactive prototypes that will be built using the Calcite Design System by Esri for ArcGIS web applications.


Included:

  • Colors
  • Text styles
  • Effects
  • Icons
  • Spacing scale
  • 22 interactive components
  • Starter web app templates
